prev_lead_virtues: endurance in the face of hardship
knowing when to fight and when to choose peace
the strength to overcome their fears

text: m_c leaves to speak with StarClan. They close their eyes and are immediately surrounded by their loved ones, friends, and Clanmates who have passed on. Stars shine throughout their pelts, and their eyes are warm as they greet the new leader.
As m_c dreams that night, they find themselves walking the stars of Silverpelt, a ghostly landscape surrounding them and a single, starry cat sat within a clearing.
m_c leaves to speak with StarClan. They close their eyes and awaken under a vast, inky black sky. They turn around to see a wary group of cats approaching, stars dotting their fur.

life_giving.text: The starry cat approaches them and, although the cat is unfamiliar, their meeting still feels like a reunion with an old friend. "My name is r_c, you meet me tonight, but the cats under your care will all meet me one day when they join the stars. For now," the cat presses their nose to m_c's forehead, "Take this gift, to help you [virtue]."
virtue: endure in the face of hardship
know when to fight and when to choose peace
have the strength to overcome your fears
see the dawn behind the darkness

life_giving.text: Suddenly, the mist at the edge of the clearing takes shape. Dozens of wispy, starry spirits emerge, quickly surrounding m_c. "We grant you your remaining [life_num] lives."  Individually, each voice is distant, but together, the force of their words shakes m_c to their core.  "Use them well, with our blessing."  And in a heartbeat, they were gone.
r_c pads up to the new leader, softly touching their nose to m_c's head. They give a life for [virtue].

r_c stalks up to the new leader, eyes burning with unexpected ferocity. They touch their nose to m_c's head, giving them a life for [virtue]. m_c reels back with the emotion of the life that courses through them.
r_c walks up to m_c, offering a life for [virtue]. They smile, and state that the Clan will do well under m_c's leadership.
A new cat approaches. r_c steps forward to give m_c a life for [virtue]. m_c grits their teeth as the life rushes into them.
r_c dips their head in greeting. Energy surges through m_c's pelt as they receive a life for [virtue]. They reassure m_c that they are almost done.
r_c walks up to m_c, giving them a life for [virtue]. They pause, then shake their head, heading back into the ranks of StarClan.
A new cat approaches. r_c steps forward to give m_c a life for [virtue]. m_c yowls in pain as the life rushes into them.
r_c approaches. Pain surges through m_c's pelt as they receive a life for [virtue]. r_c watches dispassionately.'
r_c bounds up to the new leader, reaching up on their hind legs to give them a new life for [virtue]. They flick their tail and head back to make room for the next cat.
r_c hesitantly approaches the new leader, reaching up on their hind legs to give them a new life for [virtue]. They lash their tail and head back to make room for the next cat.
A young cat emerges from the starry ranks to give a life. Starlight reflects off their youthful eyes. r_c stretches up to give a life for [virtue].
A young cat emerges from the starry ranks to give a life. They hesitate, before an older cat nudges them forward, whispering something in their ear. r_c stretches up to give a life for [virtue].
r_c strides forward, an energy in their steps that wasn't present in their last moments. They give a life for [virtue].
r_c pads forward with a wary expression. They give a life for [virtue].
r_c approaches, a warm smile on their face. They offer a life for [virtue], whispering to take care of the Clan the best they can.
r_c approaches, a blank expression on their face. They offer a life for [virtue], whispering to not lose their way.
Finally, r_c steps forward. There is pride in their gaze as they stare into m_c's eyes. They give a life for [virtue].
virtue: endurance in the face of hardship
knowing when to fight and when to choose peace
the strength to overcome their fears

life_giving.text: Finally, r_c steps forward. There is a conflicted expression on their face when they step forward and stare into m_c's eyes. They give a life for [virtue].
virtue: endurance in the face of hardship
knowing when to fight and when to choose peace
the strength to overcome their fears

text: r_c hails m_c by their new name, m_c_star, telling them that their old life is no more. They are granted guardianship of c_n, and are told to use their new power wisely. The group of starry cats yowls m_c_star's name in support. m_c_star wakes up feeling a new strength within their body and know that they are now ready to lead the Clan.
m_c_star wakes, their new name echoing in their ears.

r_c hails m_c by their new name, m_c_star, telling them that their old life is no more. They are granted guardianship of c_n, and are told to use their new power wisely. StarClan is silent as the new leader begins to wake up. m_c_star stands, feeling a new strength within their body, and grins.
